reply to Scott's
Rule of thumb for investment - do not put all eggs in one basket - 33% cash, 33% real estate, 33% investment
33% cash - in the bank or GIC in case of other investment tie-up
33% real estates - house and second house if enough money Long term plan
33% investment - RRSP, Stock, RESP, Mutual Funds Life Insurance Short term plan
RRSP : Poor men's retiment fund Life Insurance : In case of you know for your family RESP : Children's scholarship Stock or Mutual funds : high risk
My opinon on Investment 101
